text: (napiyē!) Kūṟuvīrāka: ‘‘Allāhvaiyum, nam'mītu aruḷappaṭṭataiyum; ipṟāhīm, ismāyīl, is'hāk, ya'akūp ākiyavarkaḷ mītum, avarkaḷ cantatikaḷ mītu aruḷappaṭṭavaṟṟaiyum; mūsā, īsā maṟṟum aṉaittu napimārkaḷukku avarkaḷ iṟaivaṉāl aḷikkappaṭṭavaṟṟaiyum nāṅkaḷ nampikkai koḷkiṟōm. Ivarkaḷil oruvaraiyum (napiyalla eṉṟu) nām pirittuviṭa māṭṭōm. Allāh oruvaṉukkē nāṅkaḷ (muṟṟilum) kīḻppaṭintu naṭappōm
